mqzzki-l99qqL4wru.name: Directional
mqzzki-l99qqL4wru.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

m-t9O6C6BtdDBSDSo.name: Tough Skin
m-t9O6C6BtdDBSDSo.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

mtMstS6nmx7z-a4xL.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

mWFAmG1fgI6D_XwGC.name: Oxygen Storage
mWFAmG1fgI6D_XwGC.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

m-fWOZ-Fi7A9GGd-1.name: Oxygen Storage
m-fWOZ-Fi7A9GGd-1.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mWqCL10w4yAAP_U9E.name: Oxygen Storage
mWqCL10w4yAAP_U9E.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mopEypr4al3xh552R.name: Oxygen Storage
mopEypr4al3xh552R.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mjf-axqOCFdlVbV63.name: Oxygen Storage
mjf-axqOCFdlVbV63.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

mpgLLqKapUoF5UdH2.name: Diffuse
mpgLLqKapUoF5UdH2.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mj20Lzh-cVUo1H5Xn.name: Homogenous
mj20Lzh-cVUo1H5Xn.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mh8D0Oo5GHT_lUEWC.name: No Blood
mh8D0Oo5GHT_lUEWC.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

moaMr8slzOY9GOLYs.name: No Brain
moaMr8slzOY9GOLYs.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mjwJzNbHUsJwgyLF2.name: No Eyes
mjwJzNbHUsJwgyLF2.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mCDPrnVXX5zXPKVgd.name: No Head
mCDPrnVXX5zXPKVgd.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mANLFOR15AoCXSkDr.name: No Neck
mANLFOR15AoCXSkDr.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mcI9WtGSOf0EgVVz0.name: No Vitals
mcI9WtGSOf0EgVVz0.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mln7BjhfP2MRqRfsg.name: Unliving
mln7BjhfP2MRqRfsg.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
